entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
